localizedMeta.description:
THIS CONTENT IS NOT COMPATIBLE WITH Android™ DEVICES.

It is a machine translation from Japanese.

Shalt turn off the stones falling from the sky !
It will extinguish by connecting the vertical and horizontal three or more stones of the same color and shape !
Disturbing stone will extinguish in touch !

As you become familiar with the high degree of difficulty also play!
Reflexes of you will be tried ...

Package size: 95 MB - More storage space required for install

Compatibility information:
Number of players for local play: 1 Player

Supported interfaces/sensors
- Touchscreen

Supported languages:
English(United States)/Japanese

masaya miura

Android is a trademark of Google Inc.

このコンテンツはAndroid™端末非対応です。

空から降り注ぐ石を消すべし！
縦横3つ以上同じ色・形の石を繋げて消そう！
邪魔な石はタッチで消そう！

慣れてきたら高難易度もプレイ！
君の反射神経が試される…

※縦持ちして遊びます。

コンテンツ容量: 95 MB

プレイ人数: 1人

対応機能:
- タッチスクリーン

対応言語:
英語(アメリカ)/日本語

著作権等:
masaya miura

Android is a trademark of Google Inc.
